original_title: UFC Fight Night 7: Sanchez vs. Riggs
overview: UFC Fight Night 7: Sanchez vs. Riggs was a mixed martial arts event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship on December 13, 2006 at the MCAS Miramar near San Diego, California. The audience almost entirely comprised of US Marines. Diego Sanchez continues his run up the welterweight ranks.
title: UFC Fight Night 7: Sanchez vs. Riggs
